name: Dungeon game prototype
description:
Halloween Dungeon Game

This is a prototype of a Halloween themed dungeon game



You walk around, fight some enemies, reveal the dungeon map
and look for the exit to the next dungeon floor.
It is a prototype so there isn't much to do.

The Controls are :

( I recommend Gamepad )

WASD or Left Stick to Move
Mouse or Right Stick to Aim
Left Mouse Button or Left/Right Shoulder Buttons to Shoot
To Run/Sprint you Move and Aim in approximately the same direction


You need to click on the game once to get the ambient music
( It's a browser safety thing )

F = Fullscreen
alt + R = Reload
alt + 1 = to toggle debug mode

( Music: Gathering Darkness by Kevin MacLeod ( incompetech.com ) cc by 4.0 )
